vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in LegacyTokenState.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (LegacyTokenState.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (LegacyTokenState.sol#36): it allows old versions
